text: Dato' Ng Boon Bee (; 17 December 1937 â€“ 3 August 2022) was a Malaysian badminton player. He was born in Ipoh, British Malaysia. His career began in 1960 and he retired in 1973. He won a silver medal at the 1972 Summer Olympics in Munich. Boon Bee died at a hospital in Perak, Malaysia on 3 August 2022 at the age of 84. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Olympians for Malaysia Category:Badminton players Category:Olympic silver medalists Category:People from Perak
title: Ng Boon Bee
